titles.title: To provide for the payment of aid to families with dependent children through the use of debit cards.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 7/14/1994--Introduced. Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) (AFDC) of title IV of the Social Security Act to require State plans to establish a debit card account for each AFDC recipient into which the State will deposit aid payable, which shall be accessible to the recipient only through the use of the debit card.
